author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Dashboard Quick Actions
seo_description: New dashboard shortcuts for Title/Description generation and Content Optimization.
summary: Added direct access to Title/Description generation and Content Optimization from the dashboard.
details:
Efficiency is key. We've added two new shortcuts directly to your dashboard.

What's New

  • Generate Metadata w/ AI: Jump straight to the Title & Description generator.
  • Content Grader: One click to access the Content Optimization tool.

How to use: Look for the new 'Quick Actions' card on your main dashboard view.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Long-Tail Opportunities
seo_description: Identify and optimize for long-tail search queries. Essential for AI Search optimization and capturing conversational traffic.
summary: New report to identify high-value long-tail queries, crucial for AI Search optimization.
details:
Overview

The Long-Tail Opportunities report allows you to filter your search data by word count. Long-tail keywords (typically 4+ words) are often easier to rank for and convert better than short, generic terms.

Optimize for AI Search

With the rise of AI-powered search (like ChatGPT Search and Google AI Overviews), user queries are becoming longer and more conversational. This report helps you:

  • Identify questions and natural language phrases your site already ranks for.
  • Spot content gaps where you can provide more direct, in-depth answers.
  • Future-proof your SEO strategy by targeting the "conversational tail" of search demand.

How to Use

Navigate to Reports > Long-Tail Opportunities. Set the Min Words filter to 5 to isolate conversational queries. Review the performance metrics to prioritize which topics deserve dedicated content or updates.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Content Optimization Intelligence
seo_description: Enhanced content optimization with Spacy integration for better entity recognition and keyword density analysis.
summary: Enhanced the optimize page with Spacy integration for better entity recognition and keyword density analysis.
details:
We've upgraded our NLP engine to provide deeper insights into your content's structure and semantic relevance.

Key Features

  • Better Entity Recognition: Powered by Spacy, we now identify entities with higher precision.
  • Keyword Density Analysis: improved algorithms to suggest optimal keyword usage without over-optimizing.

How to use: Go to the Content Optimization tool, paste your content, and see more accurate entity recommendations to improve your relevance score.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Brand vs. Non-Brand Analysis
seo_title: Brand vs. Non-Brand Traffic Analysis - GSC Explorer
seo_description: Automatically separate brand queries from non-brand traffic to understand true organic growth.
summary: Introduced automatic brand keyword detection to separate navigational traffic from discovery traffic.
details:
Understanding the distinction between users searching for you vs. searching for products like yours is critical for strategy.

What's New

The dashboard now automatically segments queries based on brand rules you define.

How to use: The dashboard now automatically categorizes queries. Specific brand terms can be managed in settings to refine this categorization.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: UI/UX Modernization
seo_description: A complete visual overhaul including a responsive homepage and improved user experience.
summary: A complete visual overhaul including a responsive homepage, improved flash messages, and consistent alert components.
details:
We've Refreshed the entire application interface to be closer to modern web standards.

Improvements

  • Responsive Design: Fully functional on mobile and tablet devices.
  • Visual Consistency: Unified color palettes, improved typography, and standardized components.
  • Feedback Loops: Clearer success and error messages throughout the app.

How to use: Enjoy a consistent experience across mobile and desktop, with clearer success/error feedback during data processing.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Organic CTR Modeling
seo_description: Calculate and visualize Organic Click-Through Rate curves to identify underperforming pages.
summary: New logic to calculate and visualize Organic Click-Through Rate curves.
details:
Benchmarks are good, but your own data is better. This feature builds a custom CTR curve based on your site's actual performance history.

How to use: Check the new CTR charts to spot pages performing below the expected click curve for their ranking position. These are your 'low-hanging fruit' for title and meta description optimization.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: AI Title & Description Generation
seo_title: AI Title & Description Generation - GSC Explorer
seo_description: Generate optimized titles and meta descriptions using OpenAI integration.
summary: Integrated OpenAI to suggest optimized titles and meta descriptions based on top query data.
details:
Why guess what users want when we know what they search for? This feature uses your actual search query data to prompt AI for the most relevant metadata.

How to use: In the page detail view, click "Generate Metadata" to get AI-powered suggestions that target your actual high-impression queries.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Sitewide Content Audit
seo_title: Sitewide Content Audit Report - GSC Explorer
seo_description: A holistic view of content accumulation and indexation trends across your site.
summary: Launched the "Sitewide Analysis" report for a holistic view of content accumulation.
details:
Keep your index clean and lean.

How to use: Navigate to "Sitewide Analysis" to track total indexed pages trend and identify potential index bloat or zombie pages that need pruning.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Background Report Processing
seo_description: Implemented Celery workers for asynchronous data processing.
summary: Implemented Celery workers to handle heavy data processing in the background.
details:
Large sites generate massive datasets. We've moved processing to the background so you're never waiting on a loading spinner.

How to use: Trigger complex reports and continue working; we'll process the data asynchronously and notify you when it's ready.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Advanced Date Comparators
seo_description: Compare performance year-over-year or across custom date ranges.
summary: Added a comprehensive date picker supporting custom ranges and year-over-year comparisons.
details:
SEO is seasonal. Our new date discriminators allow for precise period-over-period variance analysis.

How to use: Use the global date selector to compare this month vs. last year to filter all downstream charts.

author: GSC Explorer Team
title: Public Launch
seo_description: The initial public release of GSC Explorer.
summary: The first public release of GSC Explorer.
details:
Welcome to GSC Explorer!

We are excited to launch the first version of our advanced Google Search Console reporting tool. Connect your account to unlock deeper insights than the native interface provides.
